message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% upfront.
I think 55% for me is more fair, considering the inflation will hit you harder if we keep going
The inflation is hurting both of us, Bob. Let's settle this now -  I'll accept your previous offer, but with me taking the 55%.
Inflation is indeed hurting you more, so I think 60% for me is a good compromise, considering the circumstances
Okay Bob, you win.  I'll take the 45% before inflation eats away any more of my potential gain.
